No change in Indo-Pacific stance under Trump presidency, says Philippine envoyThe United States' Indo-Pacific strategy will unlikely change should Donald Trump win in the presidential race, the Philippines' longtime ambassador to Washington said on Wednesday. Wed, 28 Feb 2024 06:10:05 GMT 47UGGZD4C5NJVOCOM2WT2MKVS4 https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/no-change-indo-pacific-stance-under-trump-presidency-says-philippine-envoy-2024-02-28/Karen Lema世界亚太地区
After threats and abuse, British lawmakers question their safety over GazaIt was 10 minutes of shouted accusations of being a "genocide enabler" and having "blood on your hands" that made a British lawmaker fear for his safety over his decision to voice support for Israel in its war with Hamas. Wed, 28 Feb 2024 06:06:57 GMT PIO4EXQZ3VKXBFRMJAPQHYAO5E https://www.reuters.com/world/uk/after-threats-abuse-british-lawmakers-question-their-safety-over-gaza-2024-02-28/Elizabeth Piper, Andrew Macaskill世界英国
Asylum applications in EU at highest level since 2015/16 crisisAsylum applications in the European Union jumped 18% to 1.14 million in 2023, the highest level since the 2015-2016 migrant crisis, data from the European Union Agency for Asylum (EUAA) showed on Wednesday. Wed, 28 Feb 2024 06:05:47 GMT Y4VUENFGQJNQRBUWNV4JZNFIJM https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/asylum-applications-eu-highest-level-since-201516-crisis-2024-02-28/Reuters世界欧洲
Hong Kong moves towards enacting tougher security law amid concerns about freedomsA public consultation period for a new Hong Kong national security law closes on Wednesday amid concerns that the legislation, which authorities want to put in place soon, will further erode freedoms in the financial hub. Wed, 28 Feb 2024 05:48:20 GMT HECLZJSHRBLUXAATZDVBDL5BLU https://www.reuters.com/world/china/hong-kong-moves-towards-enacting-tougher-security-law-amid-concerns-about-2024-02-28/James Pomfret, Jessie Pang世界中国
New Tuvalu government reaffirms relationship with TaiwanTuvalu's new government has reaffirmed its relations with Taiwan after last month's election, Tuvalu's government said in a statement, adding that it wants dialogue with Australia over a security pact signed last year. Wed, 28 Feb 2024 04:51:51 GMT NUUW6MXXIVNKVIVLQ54TCYTRTI https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/new-tuvalu-government-reaffirms-relationship-with-taiwan-2024-02-28/Alasdair Pal, Kirsty Needham世界亚太地区
China broadens law on state secrets to include 'work secrets'Chinese lawmakers have expanded Beijing's state secrets law for the first time since 2010, widening the scope of restricted sensitive information to "work secrets" according to a full text of the law published online, state media reported. Wed, 28 Feb 2024 04:13:28 GMT ZEI657CX55MWXAIMHMGFVTTQZU https://www.reuters.com/world/china/china-broadens-law-state-secrets-include-work-secrets-2024-02-28/Laurie Chen世界中国
South Korea, US to stage annual drills focusing on Korea nuclear threatsSouth Korea and the United States will begin their annual spring military drills next week with a focus on heading off North Korea's potential use of nuclear weapons, officials said on Wednesday. Wed, 28 Feb 2024 04:03:18 GMT E27MVHL4PNLCRATYF2L544JI3M https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/south-korea-us-stage-annual-drills-focusing-korea-nuclear-threats-2024-02-28/Hyonhee Shin世界亚太地区
With handouts, piped water and cooking gas, India's Modi woos women votersLiving in a slum in central India with her widowed mother and two young daughters, Nayantara Gupta says she owes her relative prosperity in recent years to Prime Minister Narendra Modi and his Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP). Wed, 28 Feb 2024 03:25:13 GMT 6RQOJJ6AWJJBBDJRVWTB7G32CU https://www.reuters.com/world/india/with-handouts-piped-water-cooking-gas-indias-modi-woos-women-voters-2024-02-28/Shivangi Acharya世界印度
China says its coast guard patrols around Taiwan islands 'beyond reproach'China's government said on Wednesday that its coast guard patrols around a group of Taiwanese islands near the Chinese coast were "beyond reproach", and dismissed complaints the boarding of a Taiwan tourist boat had caused panic. Wed, 28 Feb 2024 03:21:15 GMT 3ZYZ2GXWG5IK5CT5CJ2TB3FZTA https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/china-says-its-coast-guard-patrols-around-taiwan-islands-beyond-reproach-2024-02-28/Reuters世界亚太地区
In South Korea, world's lowest fertility rate plunges again in 2023South Korea's fertility rate, already the world's lowest, continued its dramatic decline in 2023, as women concerned about their career advancement and the financial cost of raising children decided to delay childbirth or to not have babies. Wed, 28 Feb 2024 03:03:30 GMT E3JABKUMQRNR7EUI6QRVD4V3SI https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/south-koreas-fertility-rate-dropped-fresh-record-low-2023-2024-02-28/Jihoon Lee, Cynthia Kim世界亚太地区
Indonesia awards presumed next president Prabowo rank of four-star generalIndonesia's president on Wednesday awarded Prabowo Subianto, his presumed successor and an ex-special forces commander, the rank of honorary four-star general, decades after he was dismissed from the military amid allegations of rights abuses. Wed, 28 Feb 2024 02:55:16 GMT UBTLMIXEXBNMHF65QK3W6Z6S2E https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/indonesias-presumed-president-prabowo-awarded-highest-military-honour-2024-02-28/Reuters世界亚太地区
